newsitem.title: BELGIUM: QUOTE OF THE WEEK - FRENCH CAN LEARN FROM BELGIANS.
newsitem.headline: QUOTE OF THE WEEK - FRENCH CAN LEARN FROM BELGIANS.

text.p: "I say this to my compatriots again and again. We, Frenchmen, should show our modesty and we have a lot to learn from you, Belgians," Gerard Mestrallet, future head of the new merged Suez-Lyonnaise group, said in Brussels on Wednesday.
He was speaking at the shareholders meeting of Suez-unit Tractebel, the Belgian utility group whose board he chairs.
He told the meeting there are no plans to merge Tractebel with Suez-Lyonnaise, and that both groups would independently pursue their international expansion in utility services.
In his previous post as chief executive officer of Tractebel parent Societe Generale de Belgique , Mestrallet has spent several years in Belgium.
* (French quote: Je le redis tres souvent a mes compatriotes. Nous, francais, devons faire preuve de modestie et avons beaucoup a apprendre de vous les belges).
